metadata.title: CVE-2024-56713 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: netdevsim: fix nsim_pp_hold_write()nsim_pp_hold_write() has two problems:1) It may return with rtnl held, as found by syzbot.2) Its return value does not propagate an error if any.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
